response.job_title: Ph.D. student in Electrical and Computer Engineering in UC Davis
response.summary: Electronic engineer with abilities in digital circuit design, automation, instrumentation, and lighting design. Masters in Industrial Automation. Experience as a laboratory director, digital circuits designer, auditor, and professor. Domain of three languages, Spanish, English and German.
response.skills: Inglés, Ingeniería, Docencia, Microsoft Office, Investigación, Español, Automatización industrial, Docencia universitaria, Educación, Diseño de circuitos digitales, Diseño de iluminación

profile_positions.description: Professor at the Universidad Manuela Beltran of the program in electronic engineering and mechatronic. Subjects in the area of digital circuits design and digital control. In charge of the activities of internationalization of the program. Research interests in digital circuits, control system design and lighting design.
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Technical expert in laboratory tests accredited under the ISO IEC 17025 standard
profile_positions.title: Technical Expert / Auditor

profile_positions.description: Professor of the program systems engineering. Subjects in the area of computers programing.
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description: Lecturer in the curse of lighting design and Colombian normative. In charge of the laboratory sessions, and field lighting levels measurements.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer of engineering

profile_positions.description: Professor of the specialization in public and private lighting design at the National University of Colombia. In charge of the laboratory sessions, and field lighting levels measurements.
profile_positions.title: Professor

company.name: LABE - Laboratorio de Ensayos Eléctricos Industriales Fabio Chaparro

profile_positions.company: LABE - Laboratory of Industrial Electrical Testing, Calibration & Innovation Fabio Chaparro
profile_positions.description: Test engineering in charge of the lighting laboratory of the “Universidad Nacional de Colombia”. Execution and accreditation of tests for electrical equipment under the ISO IEC 17025 standard.
profile_positions.title: Test engineer

profile_positions.description: Intern at the Goniophotometer factory Technoteam Bildverarbeitung. In charge of the development of circuits in FPGA development boards, and execution of tests to determine the behavior of the equipment.
